document_title: Alcoholic cirrhosis: Symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: xo-gan-do-ruou.json_7_Can patients recover from alcoholic cirrhosis?
subsection_content:
Once alcoholic cirrhosis occurs, the patient's liver tissue cannot restore to its original state. Treatment methods and changes in living habits can only prevent the disease from continuing to develop and reduce the risk of complications. In mild cases, if well controlled, people with alcoholic cirrhosis can enjoy life like normal people.
Department of Gastroenterology - Hepatobiliary - Pancreas (Tam Anh General Hospital Hanoi) and Department of Gastroenterology (Tam Anh General Hospital Ho Chi Minh City) are prestigious medical centers specializing in Gastroenterology, providing examination and treatment services. High quality, effective for patients with mild to severe liver problems (fatty liver, acute and chronic hepatitis, cirrhosis, liver cancer...).
Tam Anh General Hospital system brings together a team of highly specialized and experienced Gastroenterology - Hepatobiliary, Internal Medicine - Surgery - Gastrointestinal Endoscopy doctors, in addition to the support of the current medical equipment system. modern, imported from abroad, serving the maximum examination and treatment needs of customers. Through modern medical equipment such as the EVIS Endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography, ultrasound machine with Aixplorer Mach 30 tissue elasticity..., patients can detect early-stage gastrointestinal cancer such as esophageal and stomach cancer and detect colon polyps; Management and treatment of chronic liver disease including hepatitis B virus to detect liver cancer at an early stage.
Although alcoholic cirrhosis can be prevented and controlled if detected promptly. But it's best for patients to limit alcohol, which is not only beneficial for the liver but also good for overall health.
